summary: A low-key satire that takes a droll approach to the serious subject of illegal immigration.
cast: András Hatházi|Yilmaz Yalçin|Elvira Rimbu|Dorin C. Zachei|Razvan Vicoveanu|Levente Molnár|Richard Balint|Attila Zoltan Balogh|Marius Borza|József Bíró|Petre Chimbasan|Cotrau Craciun|István Dankó|Chita Daniel Farcut|Farcut Gheorghe|Calin Hajduc|Marin Hajduc|Kinga Keleven|Gyula Kocsis|Levente Kovács|Andrian Locovei|Sebastian Lupu|Adrian Piry|Nicolae Popa|Octovian Popovici|Alexandru Purzsa|Elena Rus|Ion Ruscut|Zenemda Sasaran|Ilka Sinko|Lea Sinko|Ferenc Sinkó|Gyorgy Szferle|Marita Vasile|Pop Vasile|Alina Vicoveanu|Daniel Vulcu|Mihai Zaha
title: Morgen
